job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

candidate will have a growth mindset and a creative and collaborative approach with customer satisfaction top of mind You will be selfdriven and fueled by your passion for building and delivering amazing products to marketbrbrThis is an ideal opportunity to be part of one the fastest growing AIML companies in the industry At BigBearai were in this business together We own it we make it thrive and we enjoy the challenges of our work We know that our employees play the largest role in our continual success That is why we foster an environment of growth and development with an emphasis on opportunity recognition and worklife balance We give the same high level of commitment to our employees that we give to our clients If BigBearai sounds like the place where you want to be wed enjoy speaking with youbrbrstronguWhat You Will DobrustrongulliHelp the design and development of Model Editor for the BigBearai Product TeamliliEmpower users to efficiently and effectively create evaluate analysis system design and technical documentationliliPerform research and development for system engineering and product advancementliliContribute in all phases of the development lifecycleliliWrite experience creating Deep Learning models that recognize objects in photos videos and medialiliExperience with containerbased software deployment with Docker and Kubernetes including building custom images deploying and scalingliliExperience with developing and deploying software in a distributedcloud computing environment such as AWS including S3 EKS ECR EC2 console python and CLIliliExperience with Elasticsearch including complex queries and aggregations python libraries and cluster managementliliExpeience with RabbitMQ or another message brokerliliExperience with Python 3xliliWorking experience managing the creation of a software product or significant software toolliliAbility to obtain a US Government security clearanceliliBachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering or equivalent experiencebrliulstronguAbout BigBearaibrbrustrongstrongWhat wed like you to havebrbrstrongBigBearai is a new leader in decision dominance serving the national defense and intelligence including artificial intelligence and machine learning data science advanced analytics offensive and defensive cyber data management cloud solutions digital engineering and systems integration BigBearais customers including the US Intelligence Community Department of Defense and US Federal Government rely on its advanced technology solutions to analyze information manage risk and solve
